title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department says showers or thundershowers will occur at times in the Northern and Eastern provinces.

title: Ukraine fires several US-made longer-range missiles into Russia for the first time
byline: Ukraine fired several American-supplied longer-range missiles into Russia, officials said Tuesday, marking the first time Kyiv used the weapons that way in 1,000 days of war.

title: Suspect arrested over Rs. 70M cash in transit heist at Minuwangoda
byline: A suspect has been arrested in connection with the incident where the driver of a private company providing cash in transit services had made off with over Rs. 70 million in cash which was being transported in the Minuwangoda area.

title: Former state minister Pilleyan arrives at CID
byline: Former state minister Sivanesathurai Chandrakanthan alias Pilleyan has arrived at the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) this morning (20).

title: Former minister Harin Fernando arrested
byline: Former minister Harin Fernando has been arrested by the Badulla Police on allegations of election law violations.
